title: Handkerchief, "United Nations"
inscribed: United nations in English, French, Spanish, Russian and Chinese. In lower left corner copyright symbol with 'Copyright 1957 - Libo Shores'.
description: United Nations emblem in center surrounded by radiating spokes of flags of many countries on a green background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, "United Nations".
Medium: silk
Technique: printed. Gift of Ysabella Hincapie Gara. 1989-29-1.
